inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Label

on back of mount, in black ink: [Little Boats Must Keep to Shore/ Larger boats can venture more/ Paul R. Skoog/ (Loring Park)] and [Please return to / Paul R. Skoog/ Skoog-Smith Printing Co./ 308 So. 6th St./ Minneapolis]; on back of mount, in red pencil: [Page 133]
markings: on back of mount: 1935 Minneapolis Salon of Photography label
signed: LLC below image on mat, in brown pencil: [LITTLE BOATS MUST KEEP TO SHORE]; LRC below image on mat, in brown pencil: [Paul R. Skoog]
title: Little Boats Must Keep to Shore
